qa.question: Invited
qa.answer: An agency is a group of freelancers who have come together on Upwork. Freelancers who join an agency may do all their work through an agency (exclusive) or may maintain independent contracts too (non-exclusive). The only way to join an agency is to be invited by an agency administrator.
